H0.text: How many black keys are there on a standard modern piano. 20

H1.text: How many black keys are there on a standard modern piano. 48

H2.text: How many black keys are there on a standard modern piano. 28

H3.text: How many black keys are there on a standard modern piano. 36

A4.text: Most modern pianos have 52 white keys and 36 black keys, for a total of 88 keys (seven octaves plus a minor third, from A0 to C8).
